0.text: Bug 128586  Change parameter in drill through link doesn't work in pdf..

1.text: Description: Change parameter in drill through link doesn't work in pdf.

3.text: New a report source and a report target.

5.text: Insert a report parameter p1 in target.rptdesign, drag it to Layout.

7.text: Insert a label in source.rptdesign, define a drill through link to target.rptdesign and set p1 to "first".

9.text: Preview source.rptdesign in pdf and click the link.

11.text: Revise drill through link to set p1 to "second", then preview in  pdf, click the link.

12.text: Expected result: Target show "second" as value.
